Departing from Hong Kong
[NEW] Hong Kong requires its residents to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 before departing on the ATB flights (i.e. after 14 days upon receiving two doses of COVID-19 vaccine). This requirement does not apply to Hong Kong residents:
(a) aged below 16;
(b) not suitable for COVID-19 vaccination due to medical
grounds;
(c) with less than 90 days’ stay in Hong Kong before departure;
or
(d) using non-Hong Kong travel documents for departure.

Departing from Hong Kong
[NEW] Hong Kong requires its residents to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 before departing on the ATB flights (i.e. after 14 days upon receiving two doses of COVID-19 vaccine). This requirement does not apply to Hong Kong residents:
(a) aged below 16;
(b) not suitable for COVID-19 vaccination due to medical
grounds;
(c) with less than 90 days’ stay in Hong Kong before departure;
or
(d) using non-Hong Kong travel documents for departure.
根本就係777要搞特權階級比疫苗撚黎迫人打針
點證明not suitable？
